# strato Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "strato" {
  # Bearer token for authentication with the Strato API
  bearer_token = "your-bearer-token-here"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `bearer_token` (String, Sensitive) Bearer token for the Strato API
